name: Double or Nothing
description: Ahead, the last bastion of civilization. You've equipt your truck with a large nuclear warhead. You could end that city, end the lives of millions. But thier deaths would be instant -- instead, you could take a more nuanced path. The machines you have developed are intricately designe do cause agnoising pain over eons, you could move toward a lone man, and make his life an infinite torment. Mass death or infinite suffering, the choice is yours...

options.name: The last bastion of civilization.
options.description: A miracle. A city of survivors. The last hope for humanity, for meaning and conciousness in the universe, but for you... you have the cure.

options.name: Two survivors.
options.description: One man, just a normal man, but you could take him -- you could give him a lifetime of torment -- an infinite hell.
